Text:
I do as of today :)
Thx for the upload.

I haven't done more than glance at it. I preferred to wait for the story to be complete. But all of the scans posted previously have been really big and this is a far more reasonable size, so it's worth pulling down for long term storage.

Is it just me or have scans been getting a lot bigger lately? I'm seeing a lot of 50-meg or thereabouts files where a third of that size should look fine. It adds up to a lot of space if you're a collector.

@Foublanc2 u r welcome
@nbrazil u r right. scans r getting bigger & bigger. but i really dont know the reason. all i do is collect them from various source and upload here.
